concept.title: Filter
concept.shortdesc: In TokenScript, filter is like the search query of tokens

conbody.p: A filter is used for a TokenScript engine to find tokens, (such as Ethereum Events) and attestations by its attributes.
It's format resembles a SQL search query.

example.title: Find all tokens located in Sydney
example.p: Suppose the token we are working with is AirBnB Booking token, where each token represents an AirBnB booking. Let's say AirBnB token has an attribute locality which is a string. The following filter would result in all of the bookings made in Sydney:locality=Sydney
